modules.description: This module enables styling text with foreground/background colors and effects (e.g., bold, underlined), precise cursor positioning, and terminal screen manipulation like erasing or scrolling content. It operates on ANSI escape sequences,

This module enables customization of terminal prompt appearance through ANSI formatting and icon-based theming. It supports operations to define color schemes, text attributes (e.g., bold, underlined), and element-specific visual styles for interactive prompts. By combining string-based icons with lists of ANSI style codes, it allows tailoring the presentation of prompt components like questions, errors, and selection options to enhance readability and user engagement in command-line interfaces.

This module creates interactive command-line prompts for user input, supporting confirmations, password entry, string input, and list selections with validation and defaults. It allows customization of the terminal appearance using ANSI formatting and icons, enabling tailored color schemes, text styles, and visual elements for prompts, errors, and options. You can build setup wizards, authentication flows, and CLI tools with rich, themed user interactions directly in the terminal.
